quote: The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.
author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: Perfection is not attainable, but if we chase perfection we can catch excellence.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: Try to be a rainbow in someone's cloud.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: We know what we are, but know not what we may be.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Art is the symbol of the two noblest human efforts: to construct and to refrain from destruction.
author: Evelyn Waugh

quote: If people sat outside and looked at the stars each night, I'll bet they'd live a lot differently.
author: Bill Waterson

quote: Some people are so afraid to die that they never begin to live.
author: Henry Van Dyke
